articles.description: Cooper slipped while in possession seven minutes into the second half of the opening Rugby Championship clash in Mendoza
articles.content:
Australia outhalf Quade Cooper is tackled by Santiago Carreras of Argentina during The Rugby Championship match at Estadio Malvinas Argentinas in Mendoza. Photograph: Daniel Jayo/Getty Images

articles.description: Lock’s stunning comeback, young star stands up after last minute call-up: Wallabies player ratings
articles.content:
Dave Rennie’s team is full of character. That much is certain.
The Wallabies have once again won a Test they had every right not to.

articles.description: Quade’s RWC dream in doubt after devastating injury blow leaves No.10 jersey wide open
articles.content:
It might not just be Quade Cooper’s season that is over, but his World Cup dream too.

articles.title: Lionel Messi scores over-head kick as PSG thrash Clermont in Ligue 1 opener
articles.description: The Argentina maestro capped a fine team performance with two late goals
articles.content:
Lionel Messi scored twice – including an acrobatic over-head kick – as Paris St Germain opened their Ligue 1 campaign with a commanding 5-0 win at Clermont.

articles.title: Rugby-Rennie praises Australia character in victory over Argentina
articles.description: Australia coach Dave Rennie praised the "character and courage" of his side as they put in a superb second half performance to beat hosts Argentina 41-26 in their Rugby Championship opener in Mendoza on Saturday.
articles.content: Australia coach Dave Rennie praised the "character and courage" of his side as they put in a superb second half performance to beat hosts Argentina 41-26 in their Rugby Championship opener in Mendoza on Saturday. The Wallabies trailed 19-10 at halfti... [1545 chars]

articles.title: Wallabies’ comeback overwhelms Pumas, All Blacks lose
articles.description: Australia had a comeback win over Argentina in the opening game of the Rugby Championship as New Zealand lost to South Africa.
articles.content:
Mendoza, Argentina | Australia made light of its growing injury list by overcoming fired-up host Argentina 41-26 in their Rugby Championship opener on Saturday.
The Wallabies trailed until the 65th minute. They led for the first time when replacement... [779 chars]

articles.title: Rugby-Australia maul Argentina with big win in Mendoza
articles.description: Australia rallied in the final quarter to secure a 41-26 victory over Argentina in their Rugby Championship opener in Mendoza on Saturday, but the win may have come at some cost as flyhalf Quade Cooper limped off early in the second period.
articles.content: Australia rallied in the final quarter to secure a 41-26 victory over Argentina in their Rugby Championship opener in Mendoza on Saturday, but the win may have come at some cost as flyhalf Quade Cooper limped off early in the second period. Argentina... [846 chars]

articles.title: Think 9% Inflation Is Bad? Try 90%.
articles.description: With the world grappling with rising prices, a tour through Argentina reveals that years of inflation can give rise to a truly bizarre economy.
articles.content:
As countries across the world try to cope with rising prices, there is perhaps no major economy that understands how to live with inflation better than Argentina.
The country has struggled with rapidly rising prices for much of the past 50 years. Dur... [1723 chars]

articles.content:
